long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Best Online App for Comparing Prices- Tingi

In a world full of smart phones, you don't really have to take the trouble of stepping out of your home to shop things. Plenty of online shopping websites have developed mobile apps which bring shopping at your fingertips. However, there are too many shopping stores now, every store quoting a different price for the same product. So, how do you know which store offers the same product at the least cost? There are various apps that claim they can compare the prices of products, among various websites and provide you with the best prices. But these apps are now out of fashion as we now have an app that stands out among such apps and does what the others can't. Yes, Tingi is the latest online shopping App which compares prices between various shopping sites, and as a matter of fact, does more than that!

What Are The Features Of Tingi? 

Tingi has got cool features which are bound to impress those who use it. Any person can effortlessly use the app without having to go through many complications. Explore some of the out of the box features of the app that it showcases:

•	Comparison at its best

The Tingi App provides aplatform and displays the products from various vendors, allowing you to compare between prices of products which are sold in various online shopping stores. So you get to visit various online stores on a single platform. 

•	Type it to get it

There are not many steps included in searching the product you wish for. Unlike other complicated apps, Tingi has got a query box wherein you get instant results for every query you type in it from all online stores.

•	Provides a holistic view

Many comparison apps do the job of comparing the prices and nothing more. But the Tingi App does more than just allowing you to compare. It provides all therelated insights to your search including the cashback offer if any that might be associated with the product.

Advantages over Other Comparison Apps

Tingi has got several advantages when compared to other comparison apps. It is also simple in the interface it offers, so that the users do not find it difficult to operate. 
Most of the comparison apps just compare the prices, but totally miss out the offers that can be availed on the product. This happens because these comparison apps cannot read the whole structure properly. However, in Tingi, offers that are available are readily displayed and you can select them for yourself.
A few online stores may offer the lowest price on a product, but the seller might not be all that renowned. Tingi, however, displays the complete information related to the product allowing you to see and compare perfectly the different aspects.
